name: Break Out (PriestleyCGD)
description:
Break Out was created by one of our 2nd year Game Design Students as part of their Final Major Project. It was completed in June 2018 and took 4 months to develop. The game is a prototype and has some bugs but is completely playable and was successful in completing the brief. The student took on the role of Designer, artist and programmer.

Break Out is a 2D platformer, it is based on Priestley college and should make those playing it who attend Priestley feel nostalgic.

All aspect of the game was created by the students as part of their coursework for Level 3 Game Design at Priestley College Warrington UK

#level3notdegree
